entry.title: Irene Au / Khosla Ventures
entry.content: Irene Au is Design Partner at Khosla Ventures; former head of design at Google, Yahoo, Udacity. Yoga + meditation teacher.
entry.summary: Irene Au is Design Partner at Khosla Ventures; former head of design at Google, Yahoo, Udacity. Yoga + meditation teacher.

entry.title: Sprint (New Book) / Google Ventures
entry.content: Jake Knapp, John Zeratsky, and Braden Kowitz have a new book coming out entitled "SPRINT" that is now available for pre-order.
entry.summary: Jake Knapp, John Zeratsky, and Braden Kowitz have a new book coming out entitled "SPRINT" that is now available for pre-order.
